## ListenablePropOpts type

定义可监听的属性

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare type ListenablePropOpts<T> = {
    ready ?:string,
    noEvent ?:boolean,
    event ?:string,
    newValueKey ?:string,
    oldValueKey ?:string,
    getDefault ?:(this:T,thisValue:T)=>any
};
```
